name: She and Rope
description:
She was dressed in a professional suit, black heels and flesh-colored pantyhose that peeked out of her insteps. She is a search officer, in this city full of crime, she has solved one crime after another. But recently there was a bizarre case...
Players need to play the female search officer, through keen observation and rigorous reasoning at the critical moment to make the right choice, solve the case.

· This is a selective role-playing game.
· The player has to make choices based on the storyline.
· Different choices develop into different storylines and endings.
· The right choice will eventually solve the case.
· The wrong choice will lead to the failure to solve the case.
